name: Friday Night Funkin' Week 7 With Colored Icons And Colored Arrows!
name_original: Friday Night Funkin' Week 7 With Colored Icons And Colored Arrows!
description:
Hello and welcome to Friday Night Funkin'

This game is not mine, I just edited the files from the file.

Inspired by Friday Night Funkin'

creator: ninjamuffin99

artist: evilsk8r

animator: PhantomArcade

And There could be the new:

1. Maked the gray arrows colored

2. Exctracted the files and updated the icons by dragging and dropping icons by Clock Toon (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCEErvgy1uAiosZgKGXIgPZg)

3. Used Paint 3D to edit

4. Didn't work for Cassete Girl and Hank's icons

5. Completed Icons
